channel.title: Clark Sell
channel.description: You know, this internet thing might just take off one day. One of my good buddies, Clark Sell, has just fired up Wordpress and started blogging. His first post is a good story that Kevin Rice sent him about how...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description:
Hola!
This Interweb thingy even works in Espania! :-)
item.dc:creator: Ben
